amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to reduce the salary of Elizabeth Klien, Director of the Bureau of Ocean Energy Management, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 267, 1 Present (Roll no. 383).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 267, 1 Present (Roll no. 383).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
